colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @085A *, ,SA BDAG RNAMS KYI 'BRAS BU RNAM PAR PHYE BA LEGS BSHAD KUN 'DUS ZHES BGYI BA 'DI NI, ,RANG GI RTZIS GSAR PA BU SLOB RNAMS KYIS NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,RGYUD RDO RJE MKHA' 'GRO, MDO SDE NYI MA'I SNYING PO, STAG SNA'I SNYING PO MDO, RTZIS KUN 'DUS PA, ,LU GU GDONG RTZIS, RTZIS 'GO BRGYA PA, ,'BRAS RTZIS RIN CHEN 'PHRENG BA, ,SDOD PO DGU 'DUS, KHROM RTZIS SOGS NAS BSHAD PA RNAMS BSDUS SHING, GO BDE BAR TSIGS SU BCAD DE DUS GSUM GYIS @085B SANGS RGYAS KHAMS GSUM GYI BLA MA SRID GSUM GYI 'DREN MCHOG KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL CHENG KIS LHA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN NAM MING GZHAN RA BONG LA SENG GE BZHIN BAndI TAR 'BOD PAS, ,RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I DKAR PO ZHES PA'I MO SBRUL GYI LO MGO, HOR ZLA BCU GNYIS PA RGYAL ZLA BA'I DGA' BA BZHI PA'I NYIN RMA CHU'I 'GRAM DU SBYAR BA'I THOG MA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , SARBA, MANG, GA LAm, ,
